Weighted Residue-Wise Contact Order(wRWCO)

References

Kinjo, A.R., and Nishikawa, K., 2005. Predicting secondary structures, contact numbers, and residue-wise contact orders of native protein structure from amino acid sequence using critical random networks. Biophysics 1, 67-74.

Kinjo, A.R., and Miyazawa, S., 2008. On the optimal contact potential of proteins. Chemical Physics Letters 451, 132-135.
